src:
V: Centerpartiet underskattar AF:s problem
SLUTREPLIK. Martin Ådahl gömmer sig bakom slitna talepunkter i sin replik om Arbetsförmedlingen (28/10). Tyvärr hjälper dessa inte dem som drabbas av den framstressade privatiseringen av Arbetsförmedlingen, skriver Ulla Andersson och Ali Esbati, Vänsterpartiet.
01 Nov 2019, 10:10 by Debattredaktionen

text:
V: The Center Party underestimates AF's problems
Parting Shot. Martin Ådahl hides behind worn-out talking points in his reply about the Employment Service (28/10). Unfortunately, these do not help those affected by the stressed privatization of the Employment Service, writes Ulla Andersson and Ali Esbati, the Left Party.
01 Nov 2019, 10:10 by Debate editor
